function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced occupancy leading to continuous operation of systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to continuous operation of HVAC systems","Mitigation":"Implement automated occupancy-based system controls to optimize energy use and reduce unnecessary operation of systems","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, building automation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance team"},{"Description":"Energy consumption variations due to lockdown","Impact":"Inefficient use of energy and resources during periods of reduced occupancy","Mitigation":"Conduct regular energy audits to identify and address energy wastage, and adjust systems to match occupancy levels","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, smart building controls","People":"Building management, energy auditors","Owner":"Building owners, facility management team"},{"Description":"Measured energy consumption of refrigerators","Impact":"High energy consumption and potential inefficiency of refrigeration systems","Mitigation":"Upgrade to energy-efficient refrigerators and implement regular maintenance and monitoring of refrigeration systems","Technologies":"Energy-efficient refrigerators, refrigeration system monitors","People":"Building staff, maintenance team","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance team"}]}
